response.overview: Enter a world of a girl Yume in a pink wig who quietly enters a room with a gentleman that turns her life around til she loses her innocence. No longer the daughter she used to be. She embarks on a journey to find her own identity. This film has plenty of movie moments from going to class into an adult world of patronage.
response.tagline: Enter a world of a girl Yume in a pink wig who quietly enters a room with a gentleman that turns her life around til she loses her innocence.
response.title: Yume
